input_text:
Job Title: Environmental Svc Tech-PRN

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Interested in a career with both meaning and growth? Whether your abilities are in direct patient care or one of the many other areas of healthcare administration and support, everyone at Parkland works together to fulfill our mission: the health and well-being of individuals and communities entrusted to our care. By joining Parkland, you become part of a diverse healthcare legacy that’s served our community for more than 125 years. Put your skills to work with us, seek opportunities to learn and join a talented team where patient care is more than a job. It’s our passion.

Primary Purpose

Provides environmental services to Parkland units and departments and internal/external customers, Inclusive of some critical care areas, assuring sanitation, cleanliness, and safety in a timely manner and promotes harmonious relationships with all contacts.

Minimum Specifications

Education

None

Experience

None.

Equivalent Education And/or Experience

None

Certification/Registration/Licensure

None

Required Tests For Placement

None

Skills Or Special Abilities

Must be able to follow both oral and written directions.Must be able to demonstrate sanitation techniques, and the use of cleaning materials; 0R, be able to learn the department's techniques and use of cleaning materials within a ninety day period.

Responsibilities

 Cleans assigned areas to assure the optimal clean, sanitary and safe environment for all internal/external customers of the hospital and Parkland. Assigned duties may include sweeping, mopping, vacuuming, collecting trash, bed area cleaning, buffing floors, detailing, etc. May be responsible for responding to and using the bed tracking system to assure immediate cleaning of rooms after patient discharge for the immediate availability of the room to newly assigned patients. Harmoniously works with all contacts inclusive of patients, visitors, hospital and Parkland employees and managers, to promote optimal customer services and customer satisfaction in accord with the missions and objectives of the department, the hospital and Parkland. Maintains, correctly uses, and cares for all environmental services materials, equipment and supplies, and notifies supervisor when supply requisitions, maintenance, and/or repair is needed to assure the optimal usage of materials and safety for department services and resources.

Parkland Health and Hospital System prohibits discrimination based on age (40 or over), race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, disability, national origin, marital status, political belief, or veteran status. As part of our commitment to our patients and employees’ wellness, Parkland Health is a tobacco and smoke-free campus.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Environmental Svc Tech-PRN
output_json.summary: Join Parkland, a healthcare legacy serving the community for over 125 years, where patient care is more than a job.
job_responsibilities: Cleans assigned areas to ensure a clean, sanitary, and safe environment.
Responds to and uses the bed tracking system to clean rooms immediately after patient discharge.
Works harmoniously with all contacts to promote optimal customer service and satisfaction.
Maintains, correctly uses, and cares for all environmental services materials, equipment, and supplies.
